Name: L'Indochine
Ingredients: 10 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: STIR all the ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: This stirred cognac-based cocktail is reminiscent of both an old-fashioned and a Godfather with notes of citrus, coffee and tea.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Trinh Quan Huy-Philip, Vietnam.
Nutrition: One serving of L'Indochine contains 156 calories
